archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Article 57 database (H)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
The Article 57 database (also known as eXtendedEudraVigilance Medicinal Product Dictionary) is a repository of structured and quality-assured information on human medicinal products authorised in the EEA (i.e. nationally and centrally authorised products).
Registered EVDAS users can use their login details to access EudraVigilance Data Analysis Systemand select the Art57 publication dashboard.Users not yet registered can contact the EMA Service Desk indicating'BI_Art57_Dashboard registration request’ in the request’ subject line.
Denne databasren skal inneholde (som produsent skal legge inn) - Produktnavn - Aktiv substans - Administrasjonsmetode - Land den er godkjent i - Navn på MA-holder - Land som har ansvar for ÅPharmacovigilance - Kontaktopplysninger til den som er ansvarlig for Pharmacovigilance for et gitt produkt -
